entity.query: UPDATE IMTD_CFP_DETAILS SET CHECK_RECORD=? WHERE SESSION_ID='?' AND USERS_SID=? AND COMPANY_MASTER_SID=?
SELECT * FROM IMTD_CFP_DETAILS WHERE SESSION_ID='?' AND USERS_SID=? AND CHECK_RECORD=0
UPDATE IMTD_ITEM_PRICE_REBATE_DETAILS SET CHECK_RECORD=? WHERE SESSION_ID='?' AND USERS_SID=? AND IMTD_ITEM_PRICE_REBATE_SID=?
SELECT * FROM IMTD_ITEM_PRICE_REBATE_DETAILS WHERE SESSION_ID='?' AND USERS_SID=? AND CHECK_RECORD=0
UPDATE IMTD_ITEM_PRICE_REBATE_DETAILS SET CHECK_RECORD=? WHERE SESSION_ID='?' AND USERS_SID=? AND IMTD_ITEM_PRICE_REBATE_SID=?
SELECT * FROM IMTD_ITEM_PRICE_REBATE_DETAILS WHERE SESSION_ID='?' AND USERS_SID=? AND CHECK_RECORD=0
